purpleculture_pinyin:
sù
surname Su; respectful; solemn; to eliminate; to clean up
фамилия Су; уважительный; торжественный; устранить; очистить

肃肃		粛𢙻𦘛𦘜𦘝𦘡 pay respects, reverently
  • RS. hand stirring water 水: → 肅 → 粛 → 肃 washing hands in respect

heisig_chinese_memo: A solemn monk always carries on the same tasks without worrying.  He rakes rice whether he is in the field or staring into the abyss.
Ru_trainchinese: sù: (графема) почтительный, серьезный (используется в многосложных словах)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Even though it's a maddening task the monks stay solemn as they rake rice between the fence posts and snack on animal legs.
humanum_full_description_en:
He Linyi and Huang Xiquan believe that " Yu " is the sound symbol of " Su ". "Said Wen": "Su, hold things up and be respectful. From 𦘒 to 𣶒, be trembling and trembling. 𦘛, the ancient text is from the heart from the heart."

Bronze inscriptions express solemnity and dignity. Wang Sun's survivor Zhong: "Su Li (Zhe) Holy Martial", "Su Zhe" means solemn and wise.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from " Yu " from " 𣶒 " The original meaning of unknown configuration, the suspect will be hand-held bamboo cane to walk at the edge of the abyss, trembled meaning, the idea expressed Jhuangjing serious.
humanum_full_description:
何琳儀、黃錫全認為「聿」是「肅」的聲符。《說文》：「肅，持事振敬也。从𦘒在𣶒上，戰戰兢兢也。𦘛，古文肅从心从卪。」

　　金文表示嚴肅、莊重，王孫遺者鐘：「肅悊(哲)聖武」，「肅哲」即莊重明智之意。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「聿」從「𣶒」，構形初義不明，疑會手持竹杖在深淵邊上行走，戰戰競競之意，引申表示莊敬嚴肅。

Chinese: A solemn monk always carries on the same tasks without worrying. He rakes rice whether he is in the field or staring into the abyss.
Meaning: solemn
Hanzi: 肃
Story: Even though it's a maddening task the monks stay solemn as they rake rice between the fence posts and snack on animal legs.
Kind: traditional

何琳儀、黃錫全認為「 聿 」是「 肅 」的聲符。《說文》：「肅，持事振敬也。从𦘒在𣶒上，戰戰兢兢也。𦘛，古文肅从心从卪。」 金文表示嚴肅、莊重，王孫遺者鐘：「肅悊(哲)聖武」，「肅哲」即莊重明智之意。
He Linyi and Huang Xiquan believe that " Yu" is the sound symbol of " Su". "Said Wen": "Su, hold things up and be respectful. From 𦘒 to 𣶒, be trembling and trembling. 𦘛, the ancient text is from the heart from the heart." Bronze inscriptions express solemnity and dignity. Wang Sun's survivor Zhong: "Su Li (Zhe) Holy Martial", "Su Zhe" means solemn and wise.

肅字的基本解释

肅
sù
见“肃”。

肅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》息逐切，入屋，心。］
亦作“粛1”。“肃1”的繁体字。
(1)恭敬。
(2)庄重；严肃。
(3)拜揖。
(4)多用于馈赠或书信，表示尊敬。
(5)引进；引导。
(6)严峻；严格。
(7)萎缩；肃杀。
(8)敏捷。
(9)肃静；幽静。
(10)犹儆戒。
(11)整理；整饬。
(12)清除；平靖。
(13)姓。周卿士成肃公之后。以谥为姓。或谓为肃慎氏之后。见《通志·氏族四》。
[②]［xiāo］
亦作“粛2”。同“蕭1”。
姓氏。

肅字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【聿字部】　肅； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页971第11
〔古文〕?䏋?【唐韻】息逐切【集韻】【韻會】息六切【正韻】蘇谷切，?音宿。【說文】持事振敬也。从聿在?上，戰戰兢兢也。【廣韻】恭也，敬也，戒也。【書·太甲】社稷宗廟，罔不祗肅。【傳】肅，嚴也。言能嚴敬鬼神而遠之。又【洪範】恭作肅。【疏】貌能恭，則心肅敬也。【禮·玉藻】色容厲肅。【疏】厲，嚴也。肅，威也。　又【爾雅·釋言】肅雝，聲也。　又縮也。【詩·豳風】九月肅霜。【傳】肅，縮也，霜降而收縮萬物。【禮·月令】季春行冬令，則寒氣時發，草木皆肅。【註】謂枝葉縮栗。　又【爾雅·釋詁】進也。【詩·大雅】民有肅心，荓云不逮。【箋】肅，進也。【禮·曲禮】客固辭，主人肅客而入。【註】肅，進也。進客謂道之。　又【左傳·成十六年】爲事之故，敢肅使者。【註】肅手至地，若今撎。【禮·少儀】婦人吉事，雖有君賜肅拜。【註】肅拜，拜低頭也。【周禮·春官·大祝】辨九?，九曰肅?。【註】肅拜，但俯下手，今時撎是也。　又急也。【禮·禮運】?肅而俗敝，則法無常。【疏】肅，駿急也。【淮

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" cuts into the house, heart. ]
Also known as "粛1". The traditional characters of "SU1".
(1) Respectfully.
(2) solemn; solemn.
(3) Worship.
(4) It is mostly used for gifts or letters to show respect.
(5) Introduction; guidance.
(6) Severe; strict.
(7) Shrinking; killing.
(8) Agility.
(9) Quiet; quiet.
(10) Still wary.
(11) Finishing; trimming.
(12) Clear; Pingjing.
(13) Last name. After Zhou Qingshi became Su Gong. Take the posthumous name as the last name. Or after Sushenshi. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
[②]［xiāo］
Also known as "粛2". Same as "Xiao 1".
Last name.
Su
